basics.name: Omar Shata
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: I am a Systems and Biomedical Engineering student at Cairo University with a passion for technology and software development. With experience in MERN Stack web development, I focus on creating innovative solutions that integrate engineering and healthcare. My strengths include problem-solving, analytical thinking, and collaboration.

work.name: ezzMedical
highlights: Contributed to the development of ERA (Engineering Requirements Application), an internal tool used across all company departments to enhance workflow and ensure traceability and compliance with international standards.
Collaborated to the testing process, identifying and resolving bugs, ensuring high-quality code and reliable software performance.

work.name: Huawei
work.description: Information and Communications Technology ICT, Enterprise Solutions, Consumer Devices, and Carrier Network
highlights: Developed and optimized network automation scripts using Python, improving efficiency and reducing configuration time.
Contributed to the design and implementation of network architecture for several projects, ensuring system scalability and reliability

work.name: Scale AI
highlights: Trained Genesis LLM, Dolphin LLM to answer competitive coding questions in various topics, using C++ and Python providing solutions with tutorials and problem summaries.

work.name: Astute Imaging
highlights: Contributed to the development of several medical software solutions using React.js, Next.js, Node.js enhancing user experience and functionality.

volunteer.name: ACM FE-CU
highlights: Gained in-depth knowledge of computer science algorithms, including data structures, graphs, number theory, dynamic programming, bitmasks, and backtracking, achieved PUPIL rating on codeforces.

awards.title: Huawei HCIA - Datacom
awards.summary: Certification which validates foundational knowledge and skills in data communication technologies, including network fundamentals, LAN technologies, and routing and switching essentials.

projects.name: TherAInostics â€“ AI-Web Platform for Lutetium Treatment Efficacy (Graduation Project)
highlights: Contributed to the development of an AI Web platform using React.js and Node.js that leverages AI to assess and predict the efficacy of Lutetium-PSMA treatment for prostate cancer, implementing longitudinal tracking and all viewer tools needed

projects.name: HaimaLab Website
highlights: Contributed to the development of medical hematology lab information system, that allows staff to access the lab's information while allowing patients to access their personal information. It's powered by a smart assistant chatbot to help doctors and patients with diagnoses.

projects.name: Elearn - Learning Management System
highlights: Contributed to the development of a learning management system using C++ and Qt, enabling admin users to efficiently track and manage educational systems, also designed the UI in Figma to ensure a seamless user experience.

projects.name: Digital Signal Visualizer
highlights: Contributed to the development of a Python-Qt-based multi-port, multi-channel signal viewer for medical signals (ECG, EMG, EEG), featuring real-time visualization, signal manipulation, and PDF report generation.
